column6: small recorder with both side camera, clear picture, connect with phone
column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2022
column14: I have this recorder for 2 weeks already, I put this on my windshield, it is easy to install. There are double side tapes and cable fixer come with the package, I sticked  the camera on the top of the windshield beside of the I-pass case, I put the cord on the edge of the window with the cable fixer, that is perfect, looks neat and will not  interfere with driving. The LED screen is 2 inches, not big, so camera is small and cute. The screen can display both front and inside image at the same time, and the picture is very clear, the front camera is 2K and the inside camera is 1080P, I like it. The function that I like it most is this camera can connect with my phone by WiFi, so I can check the picture or video at any time  on my phone when I need that.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2022
column14: I bought this mainly because of safety reasons; you can't predict when accident happens and you can't argue with something that could go both ends.  With this dash cam, I drive with peace of mind.  This dash cam is not big and this is what I need; I don't want something that might block my view at any angle. The package came with everything I needed to install and the installation process was painless.  I can make changes on settings after downloading the app, which was easy to do.  The best of all, I can download videos on the app, no wires needed!!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
column14: After almost being sideswiped a few times and then cut off in traffic, I decided to buy a camera for my vehicle in case I ever needed to prove the bad behaviors of these crazy drivers. This camera is a bit smaller than I was expecting,  but that is actually a good thing since it gets mounted on the windshield. I had this for a couple months, what I have seen so far are pretty decent videos and easy-to-use controls . It took me a while to figure out how to connect the WiFi to download the videos, it would be better if instructions have more explicit usage

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2022
column14: Camera has been great until today.. when I turn on the record button.. the screen displays memory error.. I even tried two different cards.. both got very hot to the touch when i ejected them. Now I can’t record anything

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
column14: Very good quality,  crispy image, I have downloaded the SD card , every recording is clear, and it can also connect to my phone for separate largest screen. Will recommend.

column6: Perfect buy! Easy to set up
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2022
column14: I need a new web cam because I just recently driving a lot of and wanted this for when I go live. So easy to set up you really don’t need the instructions. Also this picture quality is much better than my camera I used before. and easy to use it. I really like it.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
column14: Traffic is crazy. Having a camera in your car at all times can really help you keep track of possible hit and runs, 3rd party wrecks, getting pulled over by a cop, etc.....It took me about 5 minutes to set up the camera. The video is clear and the picture quality is pretty good, despite only recording at 1080pHD.  Overall, I love it.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
column14: Excellent price point! Easy to set up and use. Overall very good quality. You should feel confident buying this product.
